page.title: 08HOME LIFE - SATURDAY
page.content: My name is Maree. I am 11 years old. I live in{Accrington.}On{ {Saturdays} I get out of bed about 1O o'clock because I'm not at school. If I was at school I'd have to get up at 7.OO a.m. I get up, get dressed, have a wash then I go down town. I go to the{open market}and hear a lot of shouting, running, cars and my brother 'nagging' my mum to buy him things. I like going to shops such as{Woolworth {and Marks & Spencers.}We always go to the Market. We buy all the food for the week days such as fruit and vegetables and beefburgers. When we get home we unpack and put all the food in the fridge and cupboard. We then sit down, have our dinner and watch television. I go for walks with the dog. I like taking the dog out over an old overgrown railway. Maree Cocker.
